content: In this guide, you can find a full list of the different Soaks in the game and where they are located, alongside our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them using the checkbox column below.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Soaks.md', within the main section titled 'Soaks', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Soaks Locations'.
The content is as follows:
In this guide, you can find a full list of the different Soaks in the game and where they are located, alongside our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can check each one off as you find them using the checkbox column below.
